actions.name: Hunter's Prowess
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: The user selects a creature, inflicting them with @Affliction[marked] 5. Whenever the user Moves, they gain +2 to their Movement Score as long as they are moving towards a @Affliction[marked] creature. The first time the user attacks a @Affliction[marked] creature, the attack is one step more effective.
